articles.title: Nintendo announces "My Mario" series of products, including Switch app - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: My Mario announced by Nintendo with new products, a new app for Nintendo Switch (and mobile), and more. Here's what's in store.

articles.title: Pixel Watch 4 ‘with Gemini’ has dual-frequency GPS, Quick Charge Dock - 9to5Google
articles.description: The latest Pixel Watch 4 leak reveals how Google will be advertising the 2025 Wear OS 6 device and Gemini plays a big role.

articles.title: Announcing the Total Victories Against Shiny Wo‑Chien in Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet - Pokemon.com
articles.description: The numbers are in—time to find out whether Trainers defeated Shiny Wo-Chien one million times in the recent Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet Tera Raid Battle event.

articles.title: How Koei Tecmo and PlatinumGames Brought Ninja Gaiden 4 to Life - Windows Central
articles.description: Ninja Gaiden 4 directors Masakazu Hirayama and Yuji Nakao say the collaboration is what made the game possible.

articles.title: What Happens When You Fold and Unfold the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 200,000 Times? - CNET
articles.description: This YouTuber showed us. It wasn't pretty.

articles.title: Take-Two Boss on ‘GTA 6’ Pricing: ‘Our Goal Always Is to Deliver More Value Than What We Charge’ - Variety
articles.description: With the "Grand Theft Auto 6" release date no longer in question, exactly how much is this game going to cost?
